chat.content:
============================
forall x y d : Z, (d | x) -> (d | y) -> d <> 1 -> d <> -1 -> ~ rel_prime x y

Related definitions and lemmas:
rel_prime = fun a b : Z => Zis_gcd a b 1 : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments rel_prime (_ _)%Z_scope
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z Arguments Zpos _%positive_scope Arguments Zneg _%positive_scope
not_rel_prime1 : forall x y : Z, ~ rel_prime x y -> exists d : Z, Zis_gcd x y d /\ d <> 1 /\ d <> -1
not_divide1 : forall a b : Z, a <> 1 -> a <> -1 -> b <> 0 -> ~ (a * b | b)
Zis_gcd_unique : forall a b c d : Z, Zis_gcd a b c -> Zis_gcd a b d -> c = d \/ c = - d
Bezout_ind : forall (a b d : Z) (P : Prop), (forall u v : Z, u * a + v * b = d -> P) -> Bezout a b d -> P
Zis_gcd_sym : forall a b d : Z, Zis_gcd a b d -> Zis_gcd b a d
Zis_gcd_for_euclid2 : forall b d q r : Z, Zis_gcd r b d -> Zis_gcd b (b * q + r) d
Bezout_intro : forall a b d u v : Z, u * a + v * b = d -> Bezout a b d
Zis_gcd_opp : forall a b d : Z, Zis_gcd a b d -> Zis_gcd b a (- d)
Z.ge = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y) <> Lt : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Z.ge (_ _)%Z_scope
Z.le = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y) <> Gt : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope
Inductive Bezout (a b d : Z) : Prop := Bezout_intro : forall u v : Z, u * a + v * b = d -> Bezout a b d Arguments Bezout (_ _ _)%Z_scope Arguments Bezout_intro (_ _ _ _ _)%Z_scope
QArith_base.Qmult_le_l : forall x y z : QArith_base.Q, QArith_base.Qlt {| QArith_base.Qnum := 0; QArith_base.Qden := 1 |} z -> QArith_base.Qle (QArith_base.Qmult z x) (QArith_base.Qmult z y) < -> QArith_base.Qle x y
Zdivide_bounds : forall a b : Z, (a | b) -> b <> 0 -> Z.abs a <= Z.abs b
Pos.le = fun x y : positive => (x ?= y)%positive <> Gt : positive -> positive -> Prop Arguments Pos.le (_ _)%positive_scope
Qabs.Qabs = fun x : QArith_base.Q => let (n, d) := x in {| QArith_base.Qnum := Z.abs n; QArith_base.Qden := d |} : QArith_base.Q -> QArith_base.Q Arguments Qabs.Qabs _%Q_scope
QArith_base.Qlt = fun x y : QArith_base.Q => QArith_base.Qnum x * Z.pos (QArith_base.Qden y) < QArith_base.Qnum y * Z.pos (QArith_base.Qden x) : QArith_base.Q -> QArith_base.Q -> Prop Arguments QArith_base.Qlt (_ _)%Q_scope
QArith_base.Qle = fun x y : QArith_base.Q => QArith_base.Qnum x * Z.pos (QArith_base.Qden y) <= QArith_base.Qnum y * Z.pos (QArith_base.Qden x) : QArith_base.Q -> QArith_base.Q -> Prop Arguments QArith_base.Qle (_ _)%Q_scope
prime_rel_prime : forall p : Z, prime p -> forall a : Z, ~ (p | a) -> rel_prime p a
rel_prime_sym : forall x y : Z, rel_prime x y -> rel_prime y x
QArith_base.Qlt_not_le : forall x y : QArith_base.Q, QArith_base.Qlt x y -> ~ QArith_base.Qle y x
prime_divisors : forall p : Z, prime p -> forall a : Z, (a | p) -> a = -1 \/ a = 1 \/ a = p \/ a = - p
not_rel_prime_0 : forall n : Z, 1 < n -> ~ rel_prime 0 n
Zeq_bool = fun x y : Z => match x ?= y with | Eq => true | _ => false end : Z -> Z -> bool Arguments Zeq_bool (_ _)%Z_scope
Z.mul_reg_r : forall n m p : Z, p <> 0 -> n * p = m * p -> n = m
Zis_gcd_intro : forall a b g : Z, (g | a) -> (g | b) -> (forall x : Z, (x | a) -> (x | b) -> (x | g)) -> Zis_gcd a b g
BinIntDef.Z.add = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0 => y | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0 => x | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' + y') | Z.neg y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub x' y' end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0 => x | Z.pos y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub y' x' | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' + y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.add (_ _)%Z_scope
Zis_gcd_ind : forall (a b g : Z) (P : Prop), ((g | a) -> (g | b) -> (forall x : Z, (x | a) -> (x | b) -> (x | g)) -> P) -> Zis_gcd a b g -> P
prime_dec_aux : forall p m : Z, {forall n : Z, 1 < n < m -> rel_prime n p} + {exists n : Z, 1 < n < m /\ ~ rel_prime n p}
OMEGA6 : forall x y z : Z, 0 <= x -> y = 0 -> 0 <= x + y * z
Z.eq_dec : forall x y : Z, {x = y} + {x <> y}

```intros x y d H1 H2 Hd1 Hd2 contra. apply contra. apply rel_prime_sym in contra. apply prime_rel_prime in contra. 2: apply H2. 2: apply H1. apply not_rel_prime1 in contra. destruct contra as [e [Hgcd [He1 He2]]]. rewrite Zis_gcd_sym in Hgcd. apply Zis_gcd_unique in Hgcd. destruct Hgcd. subst. contradiction. subst. contradiction. Contradiction. apply Z.eq_dec.```

original: intros x y d H1 H2 Hd1 Hd2 contra. apply contra. apply rel_prime_sym in contra. apply prime_rel_prime in contra. 2: apply H2. 2: apply H1. apply not_rel_prime1 in contra. destruct contra as [e [Hgcd [He1 He2]]]. rewrite Zis_gcd_sym in Hgcd. apply Zis_gcd_unique in Hgcd. destruct Hgcd. subst. contradiction. subst. contradiction. Contradiction. apply Z.eq_dec.
